The claim made by the presumptive GOP pr: a shocking 20 veterans are committing suicide each and every day, especially our older veterans."
The claim was verified using research co: VA), which examined about 55 million veterans' records from 1979 through 2014. The research found that in 2014, 7,403 veterans took their own lives, which averages to about 20 veterans a day.
The VA: s research also revealed that 65 percent of veterans who took their own lives in 2014 were 50 or older, supporting the claim that the daily suicides particularly affect "older veterans." However, it is important to note that younger veterans had the highest rate of suicides, with those ages 18 to 29 having a suicide rate of 77 per 100,000 in 2014.
